values:
I JUST WANT TO SAY HAPPY VALENTINES DAY TO MY VALENTINES ; Josie, Stevie, Katrina, Sarah, Mitchel, Bobby, Kira, Daniela, Gianna, Tara, Jeremiah, Matt, Kim, Rachel, Stephanie & Christina  

HAPPY BIRTHDAY DYLAN BOSSIO AND STEPHANIE SADAKA 

I LOVE YOU ALL ! <33
-andrea falco

k so i clearly have written on this in forever .. & since i had a funny day full of laughter i figured id write one
so i started by getting outa bed at like 6 oclock to meet avery and decorate sarahs locker for her birthday; well what fun that was i got to school at 7:15 and i find avery in the caff working on her math . so i kidnapp her and we busted out my box of streamers and wrapping paper and did an amazing job putting all the decorations on especally that pole LMFAO! it looked like u guys took a shit load of streamers and just threw it there ahaha but it was fun fun times, then we gave sarah her crown that WASNT made ahahaha.. kay then it started in geo when i was bored outa my mind because of that stupid video after it was done and we were taking up the work i noticed this blue dot on bobbys forhead and then i noticed he had blue on his thumb so i started dying of laughter and him and christina didnt get me they thought i was just on crack but then i showed him what it was and his face was PRICELESS! ahaha it was soo funny, then math came and boy oh boy in math beating sarah with her birthday beats to "doing" work .. it was just so fun like usual =) then gym where we had a supply and did nothing but give massages and checked out the boys;) ahahahaha oh man then jordan comes inside; "what is this applied gym?"   ahaha oh man then got let out early for b / c lunch and thats when the party started . i ate lunch with rachel, celia and emilie . then went to mine & emilies locker and thats when we met mr.tomei and i asked him if we could decorate our homeroom door and all we had was streamers from the morning.. and i had a hole box, lets just say it was a PARTY with the streamers and the box was empty by the end .. streamers eveywhere hanging from the ceiling & hanging off of people it was the funniest shit =) then we got to loud so mr .tomei came by and told us to take it down it was the sadest thing of our lives .. aha then my last class .. which was btt ; man that was fun to so i finished all my work so i sat and watched a movie / talked.. me and michelle and mable and cass caught up with our passions love =) then just hung out with sarah for the rest of the peroid on her special day =) since it was dedicated to her and only her .. ahaha .. ugh then came extra math help and as borning as it was and how my computer wouldnt work :@ it was fun when we started doing math problems online .. ME & PILAR ARE MATH FREEKS =) (L) aha haa

so if u couldnt already tell.. I HAD AN AMAZING DAY =) 

( 4 )   all i want for christmas .. 
andreaDOTfalco

i have friggen geo to do but i cant do it.. well maybe after i get this over with ..

how do i forget everything that happened, in a matter of 2 months we went from incredibly tight-liking eachother-nothing.. its been a while now almost 2 and a half months and im still complaing, still wanting things normal again. & its not as if i didnt try i tried so much and sometimes i feel it normal again.. and then other times we just dont talk. we moved on so fast.. well you moved on so fast .. im still here wishing that things could be normal again.. i want our friendship back. i want to be able to ask you for adivce and go to you to make me smile. and i wanna sign online and have you message me all the time, and i want to hear ur voice on the phone .. not only because you sound so hot but because it made me feel good.. ive lost so many close friendships before.. and it didnt take long for me to get over it.. but with you . fuck its like a totaly different story. you ment so much to me, you still fucking do. i keep telling myself its not worth it i need to let go,, but i cant. because when i try something always finds a way of coming back.. i dont want you to love me or even ask me out. i just want you to talk to me like u did be4 i want you to message me when i come online .. is that too much to ask? 

thisFUCKINGkills</3
`*andrea_

ive been busy & havent been on LJ in forever.. soo
highschool is meh.. 
semester 1: 
geo: with dylan, christina, gorgina brenna, britt, rita, helen,STEPHEN!
math: with brenna, sarah, helen, britt, cass, christian, chris and.. him
Gym: with brenna, rita, helen, britt, kira, emily, julia, claire & sabrina
info tech: with sarah, lauren, terrence, adrian, christina, gorgina & cass 

so each class is FUN! altho C LUNCH.. but its okay i have A lunch on day 2 

other than school;

working things out with brendan 
working things out with mike
staying happy for matt
trying to figure out where i went wrong?

                         --those r goals for the next month 

Dear Tara & Matt;
i love you both soo much and i've been soo blessed to of met you both.. thanks to gianna.. aha.. you guys know almost everything i feel and over the past 2 or 3 months we have became ridiculously close.. if i had the chance id come to ward everyday.. you guys are amazing. thanks for everything.. I LOVE YOU! 

Dear the 5 losers:
filomena, daniela, aliana, stephanie and christina you guys r the coolest losers ever.. like i can just be myself or a plain old bitch with you guys and you will know the reasons.. & i know in highschool its  harder to stay close because of my hole c lunch factor and the fact that 3 of u r in laptop.. but either way ill always love you.. and for 3 of you losers; steff, aliana & christina.. spending the friday with you guys was so much fun and i know the NOOSE thing was funny.. but im not that stupid.. lol it looked like NOSE! &&  WTF does NOOSE mean?? ahaha.. with slut number 1; dee .. i've had so much fun with you; crossing the road or bike riding or waiting at the corner of the street waiting for something to be said ..LOL and to the last loser ever filomena... you have one stupid grade 10 in ur info tech class.. LOL if you dont out smart him.. ur just dumber than me:P ahaha.. LOVE YOU ALL SOO MUCH:)

those r my love letters to the 7 of you :)
&& i also love Gianna, Christine, Britt, Sarah & Brenna


[[i shouldnt love you but i want to
i just cant turn away
i shouldnt see you but i cant move
i cant look away
and i dont know how to be fine when im not
cause i dont know how to make a feeling stop
just so you know
this feelings taking control of me
and i cant help it i wont sit around; i cant let him win now
thought u should know
 ive tried my best to let go of you
but i dont want to
i just gotta say it all
before i go
just so you know
its getting hard to be around you
theres so much i cant say
do you want me to hide the feelings
and look the other way
and i dont know how to be fine when im not
cause i dont know how to make a feeling stop
this emptiness is killing me
and im wondering why ive waited so long. looking back i realize
it was always there just never spoken
im waiting here..been waiting here]]

got myspace; www.myspace.com/andrea_xo
 .. add me if you have it

so updates?
broke up with him.. so single and surprisingly not liking someone at the moment.. bets on who im going to like next? ahaha.. anyways.
CUBA TOMORROW:) yeye hot and sexy cubain boys. maybe some dirty dancing.. ahaha jks jks steff:P.. okay thats about it. ill leave a bigger one when i get back:) byeee

[mood:  excited]
[music: ready for love by cascada]

wow i have not updated this in like a month. i guess ive been busy.

school: it ended off pretty good,  highschool next year :-O im not scared nemore. but grad was memorable and the last day playing limbo and just sitting around talking. it had its ups & downs but all in all.. ill miss everything. & i love each and every kid in st.monicas graduating class of '06.

wonderland & summer rush: well the day me, dee, steff & chirstina went to wonderland was just jokes. my scream was the coolest & you all know it =P && summer rush was pretty good. the wait in line was long but i made new friends who r the coolest of the coolest =) i saw nat & sarah again. that was cool we always meet again at these things. so when we got in i got into a fight with the bitch beside me b.c she took our seats. then i ran back and fourth to get ppl. then the show started it got pretty good untill the people beside me started smoking weed & became messed up. then 1 hour latter someone had a gun. scary scary. i had to stay cuz no one was going to leave so i was sitting on my chair crying and shivvering. yeah thats about it for summer rush 

friendship: got into a huge trust fight with this guy i trusted so much. but we worked things out. its amazing. i love you brendan :)

birthday: i had the party with my friend which was so jokes; the water fight, listenin to all the gossip, naked boys, nick ripping his shirt... so much more. i love you all and thanks for making it so memorable. =)  & yes adam wonderland & the movies this summer. we r going to become best buddies =P since you say im the only  one who doesnt make you bored . ..  haha then the party with the family; sitting at the table talking to christine & peter about the latest gossip and love life.. haha.. && the scary moth.. just having everyone with me on my special day was fun

stratz:  oh man what to say about stratz. i had an okay class.. got better later when i started talkin to others. tryin to beat John on all my assignments.. never happened =( NEEERRRRDDDD!! then tryin to piss of alexander =) haha .. even just screaming STEEEVVVVVIIIIEEEE down the hall was so much fun. aww im going to miss it. the jokes. sign my ass with samii.. 54321 ehhhahhhhahahhh .. my rocket laugh LMAO JOSEPHINE! then going up to the random kid and talkin to him for a dollar. i made both him & my friends laugh=) scoreee.. then blue hair kid (robert) who i swear must of thought we were weird lmao. OH OH OH HOW CAN I FORGET?!?!?!?!?!!! BBBBB LLLL OOOO NNNN  DDDD  IIIIII EEEEEEE!!!! whew he was sexy i think everyone stalked him. damnnnnn (H) haha then the serious convos with lauren down the halls.. we r going to become bestest buddies in highschool =) MY NERD GLASSES I FORGOT =( NOO CHEALSEE, all the jokes with stephanie & christina to many to say. but the best was the end of the day of the last day of stratz. going around taking pics on the pole! lmao. then when me & steff came back to our house. the shower cap.. OMG ANGE THIS IS LIKE PUTTING A CONDOM ON A BIG DICK!! LMFAOOO then your song (that i thought you made up ) in my msn name;; LETS TALK ABOUT SEX; BABY (8) .. your crushed dreams. omg so jokes:P love you all sooo muchhh. you all complete me=) 

love life: im over dick head.. YEAHHH!!!! it hurt me at first cuz i thought he was shy and then he turned out to be a big asshole. so it killed me. but its okay cuz everything happens for a reason i moved on. but im kinda scared 3 weeks no talking:| we will be apart. dammnnn im going to miss you soo much =( 

okay thats in a nut shell what happened in the 2 weeks =) haha alrite byebye-x0

[<b>mood</b>| <sad]
[<b>music</b>| a million miles away by rihanna]


now im sitting here crying of all the memories we have had. & now we r leaving within a week & a half. im going to miss nick so much. i never really noticed untill lately. & all this stuff at home with my mom. i donno what to do. the day my family realizes that they cant keep this family together without me. b.c my mom wouldnt get nething done around the house. my sisster wouldnt have neone to talk to or fix that computer. my brother wouldnt have someone to fight with .. i donno wut to do

thanks brendan price & adam robb <3 

okay now the Italy game is on. ill leave it later

andrea-xox

p.s dont you just love the Laguna beach mood icons :)

OH MY GOSHHH!! 
MY MSN ISNT WORKING! JUST MY ACCOUNT:@ LIKE I WENT ON JAMIES.. lmfao ND IT WORKED BUT MINE DIDNT:@ SOO ANNOYED.. NEONE READING THIS CALL ME:) IM SOOOO BORED THANKS:)
[mood| tired] [music| breaking free from highschool musical] TRYING THIS NEW MOOD ICONS.. HOPE IT WORKS!
people telling me i should fight for him but should i .. ive never faught or gone after someone i liked.. its weird.. i dont know wut to do

so i havent updated this in like years soo.. first we started off doing speeches with mel & frenchie we werent really working mostly like choping the paper in half lol:) then at recess with that crabby supply teacher omg! it was funny tho lmao then during math.. omg christina...:-0 omg omg nick: i knew it lmfao.. then at last recess jokes with nicks water balloon lmfao then last peroid when we made it into a baby with a 8 pac abs.. it was me nd calvins baby.. then he proposed because he realized i couldnt do it on my own.. lmao it was soo cute lol then with the frigenship tape braceletes omg awesome.. then steff came over we rapped the present made the card nd watched rent.. we were a little late but oh well the traffic on rodick was soo bad rite steff?? lmfao wopps.. then we went to the mvoies omg girls i saw channing first so i get him.. dam rite biatches=P lmao so jokes then back at fils even more.. taring off our clothes wow so many jokes then on the comp.. lol then our talks.. then i came home nd here i am now.. nd going to bed.. talk to you later g-night andrea-xox

R E N T <3

so wut ive realized of the week;; MY FRIENDS R SKANKS=P & S2
haha okay so saturday;;
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO.. 
Justin-> your my brotha from anotha motha, omg i love you with all my heart when things go bad i can turn to u
Nick-> wow ive known u since i was young ur awesome i love you (nick & andrea rox your sox =P)
Rita-> oh wut to say about you.. well you awesome my hyper buddy for live
RIP Nonno, i friggen love you soo much you were my nonno from scarb the one i went to on pa days who would always tell me to go to sleep after lunch! i miss you its been 4 years and some how i always dream your still here; i miss you
okay so spent the day in the garage;; get better soon daddy. i noe i musta hurt you and laughed so hard after cuz the fall was just soo funny, u noe im sorry.. 
then me nd my daddy worked on the science project then in the night christina came over; it was soo funny so many jokes i love you. we did no work; we started by trying on clothes then came downstairs nd opened r books (thats as far as we got) went on msn, went on pedros spaces nd left alot of coments. LMFAO.. the "faking" our science;; 

The shoe is like so cool .. and like thur adias and they smell like Gianfranco. Marisi , umbro w/e. and like yeah. So um .. yahh Madonna . SO WE LIKE TESTED IT ,, AND THE BOARD IS LIKE GREEN, AND THE NAILS ARE SILVER.. crrr-aaayyzay = ) . YEEEH and , 
oh my lmao, then 2day i went to church then gianfrancos hockey we were the loudest people in the arena;; but woot woot gianfranco scored 2 goals; the only goals scored. lmao then we came home i finished my shit load of hmwk then watched movies with my dad then now talking to steff with our whoeish convo like usual.. steff thats like asking to be effed!! bad girls for life=)=P

eww school 2morrow:(
OKAY THATS IT.. BYEBYE

TUESDAY MARCH 21, 2006
oh today was just soo funny so first mr.d is moving people nd me nd christina put on our lil innocent faces nd he lets us stay:) then reces ohh that was jokes.. the dances.. especally the one where u throw off ur jacket.. smack nd pull up.. let run steff..LMFAOO then with the love letters at the end of the day omg lmaoo.. then getting the irannyy newspaper with als lmao.. then everything we did be4 class was just soo funny then durning class.. ohh chris nd pedro u make me laugh soo much ..and now with fill.. okay so my mission for 2morrow is to flirt with him all day.. that shouldnt be that hard.. lets brainstorm.. yess im good at the:) && liek what u would do if he played u.. nahh i dont whore slapp ill just um lift.. lmfao fil..love yahh
okay now im going to bed gota to get rest for 2morrow mission 

What a fun-filled day:)

SATURDAY:)
okay so i wenrt to hollister, abercrombie & ae at sherway and i bought 6 shirts and one sweater spelt a grand total of 300 something so im brokeee.:( andd then we went to red lobster with the family and julia and we had dinner duhhh nd then we came home nd antoinette drove us to second cup and then to go watch shes the man.. omg the movie is the best its soo funny we love channing.. ehhee same with robert hes hot too ahah yes then came home nd went to bed

SUNDAY:)
woke up went to my brothers gay hockey game.. the lost(N) 3-6 okay then we went to 12:30 church wow.. its like soo late.. k then we went shopping nd then to novellos and then home.. then back out this time with the family to the LaRocca;s house wear i got my hair cut.. these bangs r killin me i look friggen 10.. aaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhh!!! 

MONDAY:) 
first day back to school;; whewww finally nahh i dont wanna be back.. but we moved r desk just cuz they were in a mess i sit beside christina and farah thats awesome, i can talk to christina bout everything nd farah bout mike:) eather way im in a good spot (YN) hope mr.d dont change me:P um wut else happened well yes we did have recess nd i got really bad cramps at lunch so my mom came durning math nd we talked in the office cuz i didnt wanna go back to math ahaha.. but then she gave up nd sent me back up..:( um yah nd then durning science we worked on project nd fooled around.. yahhh.. now my grando annoucement ive waited forever for.. WE ARE SINGING SEASON OF LOVE FROM RENT FOR C.NIGHT IN MAY.. WOOT WOOT:)!!!! did i mention i love my music teacher!:)

FINISHED

WEDNESDAY
me and my sister stayed home and died of boredum while my mom went gallaventing then we ordered pizza nd had a junkfood lunch that no mother would let us have.. ahaha then went over to the plaza got bread for my mom nd rented season two of the oc. then came home nd watched it

THURSDAY
we went down to yorkdale. met up with gianna and family. went into bcbg bought a dress for grad.. finally:) its black nd frills at the bottom it is not slutty steff..wot wot um yah and did other shopping things

FRIDAY
woke up at like 9 then got ready to go out at 4 at like 10 oclock watched the oc nd rent.. then went to the movies.. shes the man was sold out do we went to see failure to launch then a mess up happened with the boys nd my moms cell.. just for being nice.. wutever. then in the movies with als, steff &christina we friggen screamed everything so loud.. like "what a skank", guys dats sad shes crying.. "andrea, wtf thats good for her she learned her lession" but she was a good girl.. "she slept with a guy cuz of the parents.." lmfao it was just funny then j-walking with aliana on hwy 7 ahaha.. then  on our way to kelseys "no wonder hes soo.." christina ur a bitch lmao steff & als.. okay then at kelseys we all order the same thing.. with our waitor gerogeee, how do u noe his name.. well it says it on his tagg duhh!! lol.. okay well then its alianas birthday you know.. lmaoo.. damm it they didnt come to sing.. it was "too" busy ahaha.. oh so many jokes love you girls.. x0x  P.S happy st.patricks day

Entrey eh finto:)

SUNDAY:)
so i woke up stayed in the house of boardum then had lunch then left to go shopping in woodbridge for dresses and conformation gifts.. well i got my conformation gift but not the dress.. we r going later on in the week for that.. then i went to giannas.. my mission failed i was unable to kidnapp her:( another day but i had fun writing the love letters for d & j to see when they look thro ur agenda:P:) 

MONDAY:)
guys i had a dream here it goes;;  

okay me, steff, christina, fil, daniela all went shopping at markville mall and we turn the corner nd guess who we see;; cjt with a bunch of guys from uhs, & he was there so we all freek out nd think of a plan to "pretend" im drunk. se we go over there nd im acting freggen crazy nd cjt was like andrea wuts wrong nd the girls all say;; shes drunk nd i say no u friggen losers im not drunk nd then cjt tells me to calm down nd im liek im sick of calming down so i look over nd there he is nd i run over to him nd im liek boy, you make my heart beat i love you and then kiss him then after hes looks over at cjt nd is like wuts wrong with her nd cjt says shes drunk. dont mind her.. nd hes like no if shes drunk we gotta sit her down nd calm her down (he was acting as if he cared) then..we went to sit down nd hes like andrea u need to get a bottle of water so steff goes nd gets me water nd hes pourning it in my mouth tryin to help me.. nd then hes like andrea if ur mom sees u like this i noe she will freek;; andrea u need to go home, ill go call ur house, then i say no, im staying here with my friends im fine neways look i can walk in a stright line..i fall on the ground nd hes like see andrea ur not nd then steff comes nd shes like andrea lets go nd then im like okay fine wutever.. nd then hes like andrea take care of urself!

okay so then after i watched teh crack ass steff make a fool outa herself, she woke up way to early lets just say that.. then i died of boredum the rest of the day untill 7:) steffypoo came over:) we watched the notebook.. steffs first time lmao while watching the notebook steff decided to let out some gass  nd then we made a paln for the movies.. steff you look good nd he looks good nd ofcourse i look good so let s go or we will be late!! lmao friday yo(H):P then after we went on msn.. lmfao.. so we talked to him nd we were liek hi hunnie nd steff goes do u say that to him im liek nope but i do now;) then we change r msn names to luving gucci.. lmfaoo btw we devorced gucci know.. lmfao steff..nd then being the nicest girls when talking to other people.. tryin to say take her slutty hands off of him but ofcourse i cant do that.. cuz im too nice.. steff u were a boutana..:) get some italian going.. ahaha but thats works right cuz we r both cakers.. oh there was so many more jokes.. love you to death 

Tuesday:)
so woke up got changed nd then went to cearas house then took the bus & subway downtown to go.. shopping:)ching ching:P we went into stores.. i finally bought the rent soundtrack now i wont be downloading them nemore.. she bought james blunt for her friend.. lmfao.. long story.. we went for lunch. nd the waiter was such an ass.. he was smoking something in the back.. i haveta say he was crazyyyy.. okay wut else happened.. umm.. we went into stores nd found expensive prices lol then we came back home.. gave ceara some pure italian food:P.. then watched rent wait be4 that we talked to him.. lmfao.. r u and ceara lezbos together.. ceara: no but i think u nd ...... r lezbos together.. good thing u didnt send it:P then talking bout other stuff.. ahaha k back to rent... we replayed light my candle 3 times lmao then watched the hole movie once.. then in the other room:P lmaoo.. wut happens there says there.. ahaha.. okay then we came upstairs took some friggen crazy pictures with anne of green gables things. aha then look through the yearbooks.. she helped em pick out something to wear for friday.. so guys ill be ready be4 all of u:P ahaha.. aha so much more.. fun night love you=)

Thats my 3 days so far ill leave more later;; andrea-xox

YESTURDAY:)
woke up at 9 b/c people were coming to fix r wirlpool thing.. then i went shopping with my mom; i bought the cutest bra eva its brown w a pink flower=P i also bought two shirts from costa blanca; one orange with lace nd the other white and like its hard to explain but its cute um okay then i come on msn nd terrence starts talkin to me nd told me his parents won the lottery nd that they won 25,000 nd terrence got 7000 so terrence became my surgar daddy; lmao then i call christina nd tell her..

moi : " OMGSH CHRISTINA ! GUESS WHAT "
christina : " WHAT ?!?! "
moi : " TERRENCE'S PARENTS WON THE LOTTERY ! " 
christina : " you fucken liar "
moi : " NO HE JUST TOLD ME .. AND IT SAYS IT IN HIS NAME ! "
christina : " liar "
moi : " I SWEAR ! "
christina : " how much ? "
moi : " 25, 000 ! & he gets 7,000 of it ! "
christina : " shit thats crazy .. hes so taking us shopping "

ssoo , we like told everyone , .. cause like ; THATS CRAZYY ! , well i told alotta people ;  then around seven, christina came over to watch RENT , so many jokes - the tranny, ' the only real couple ' , and soo much more. HILARIOUS ! <3 - i quote from christina "and the movie was actually pretty good , but the singing can drive you a lil nuts at times ; BUT OTHER THAN THAT ; very good = ) !" TOLD YAH SUCKERS:) then went on msn .. AND FOUND OUT FROM TERRENCE HIMSELF THAT MIKE & MARIO & PEDRO ARE FRIGGEN SHIT DISTURBERS!!...love you guys=P lmfao LADIES WE R GOING SHOPPING WITH MICHAEL SCARPITTI&MARIO CELEBRE&PEDRO MALVAR. aand then went upstairs cause christina bro came i made her try a holly dolly" these taste fattening " - "they are " - " thur still good ". lmfaoo ! . haha. jokes with you love yah.. talked to jer & gianna untill 1 on msn then went offline nd too bed:)

TODAY:)
i friggen idolize my whore; STEPHANIE DANIELLE TORTORICI:) 
so this morning i slept it untill 11 then took a one and a half hour shower:) then came downstairs noticed the basement was cleaned:| then had brunch.. then me nd my sister went for a walk rented "walk the line" that friggen movie is soo long nd its about johnny cashes life.. we also got icecream=P nd looked for magzines on home decor since we r finishing r basement.. finally:).. then we went to my aunts house so much fun there.. we looked at bridal/grad dresses on the intrenet. found a few i like.. girls this is my dress; REALLY low cut line at the top with a big slit at the bottom in the colour brown nd pink.. or else nothing:P lmao steff.. wow so many other jokes with you steff.. to many to be able to name.. love you my idol/carbon copy of me:) then christina.. that bitch thinks shes getting the man ive grown to love so much.. ill friggen fight for him if thats the case.. but i talked to him nd he said he was just trying to make her feel special but shes all taylors.. lmfao..love yah calvin.. nd our talks while playing twister wow you rox my friggen soxs:) 

The end;; andrea-xox

MARCH BREAK HERE WE COME:) 

so today was the last day before march break nd it was awesome.. we played cards.. well signal all day first recess we sucked but then durning lang we kicked ass (me & christina) our signals were the best.. lifting it, rubbing it, rubbing a leg of the member beside you..<christina rubbing jer hes like shocked nd then i call signal, then jordan he doesnt even call it jer called it, then frenchie lmfao that was jokes i rubbed his leg nd he looks down nd was like tryin to make out the words cut.. it was soo funny then at the end of the day frenchie says bye to me "dont ever rubb my leg again:P"> omg lmfao.. we had so much fun 2day then at the end of the day walking home with calvin nd our convo.. omg calvin u r the best i friggen love you..cuz ur gonna take me to the rainbow nd the serve me licks, a big german gussie wininer..lmfaoo oh man u freggen make me laugh.. then with steff. Anne of Green Gables:)
the show is over its been almost 6 months nd its over.. im gonna miss the cast so much but i must say this week has been the best week ever.. 
monday & tuesday & wednesday i was really sick so i was like sleepy, took alot of medicine. wednesday was opening night; which also ment my first time performing at the markham theatre. i must say it wasnt nerve racking at all .. no one was really there for me the first night but on thursday; rita, michelle, vanessa, dylan, nd some of my family came.. i could hear my cuzions laughing at all the scenes even the sad ones.. liek when matthew died she was laughing at the fog thingy because it made the funniest noise.. sopposently:s.. hehe dylan thanks for actully staying through the whole production.. jokes with rita after> damm;) haha. then on firday was crazyy more family came nd so did my friends; steff, fil, daniela nd christina.. haha im sure u guys had a blast i heard all about it.. it was joke when i came upstairs to meet up with u guys when u saw.. 'ehhem'  is it okay to say I TOLD YOU SO! haha then after talking to him.. ur friends r weird.. yes i noe they r but i love them:P saturday we had two shows one matine nd one at 7:30> over to kelseys with the cast inbetween then the party at johns house..was fun. me nd jill where the youngest yet coolest ones there.. other then that i noe some people left that house really happy; *cough*danielle*cough* haha jokes:P S2.. then sunday being our last show was awesome.. then the party after at the warden house (the house we thought was a shelter) ahaha.. UTC/anne of green gables/ryan, dom, anthony, dan band:) was awesome.. then all the dancing nd songs getting everyones email.. it was just a good way to end the show.. durning this week playing cards became our life. playing spit with ryan, kristin, veronica, playing president with dom, sam, chealse, playing rummy with hudson nd antoinette, playing cheat with almost everyone, playing goLD fish with louie, ryan, kevin, veronica, kristin and junnie, playing nickynickyninedoors with sam and amber.. running up nd down the halls bouncign into people.. r just jumping around, fun times in our dressing room.. nd now its tiem for bed. its been fun nd im gonan miss everyone so much byebye andrea-xox

How I wish I could surrender my soul;
Shed the clothes that become my skin;
See the liar that burns within my needing.
How I wish I'd chosen darkness from cold.
How I wish I had screamed out loud,
Instead I've found no meaning.

I guess it's time I run far, far away; find comfort in pain,
All pleasure's the same: it just keeps me from trouble.
Hides my true shape, like Dorian Gray.
I've heard what they say, but I'm not here for trouble.
It's more than just words: it's just tears and rain.

How I wish I could walk through the doors of my mind;
Hold memory close at hand,
Help me understand the years.
How I wish I could choose between Heaven and Hell.
How I wish I would save my soul.
I'm so cold from fear.

APRIL 3rd, 2005 i was at church and this boy brown hair brown eyes..dont sound too attractive but i promise u he was..he stood out in a big croud. never new his name so i named him church boy. i always wanted to talk to him just tell him my name find out his..the smile he gave me filled my heart with a thousand words. it was september 24 when i first talked to him..our first convo and i was so proud that i was strong enough to go up and talk to him, it was a convo i will never forget the joke..OH MY GOD, NO WAY! will always stick him my head along with his adorible looks. but as of january 15th 2006 everythign changed..my obsesive crush on him came to creek it wasnt truely over till i saw him this morning i looked over and there he was i got a sharp pain in my heart, a feel of disgust. then when he said hi.. something ive always wanted.. really didnt feel anything special nemore.. something that wpuld of ment the world to me abotu a week ago suddenly felt so empty nd away.. i still said hi but with a look of disgust.. probably the dirtiest look ive ever given to a 'old' crush. so as of today i can say... i no longer love him,

i no longer hope we were together

&&no longer feel that hes apart of me

I feel like im losing myself,

to a point where i dont even know,

who i am anymore?..
